      • toWords

        public java.lang.String toWords(int number)
                         throws InputException
        Translates Integer to human language format. Current implementation uses following 10 ten 100 hundred 1,000 thousand 1,000,000 one million 1,000,000,000 one billion
        Specified by:
        toWords in interface IWordifiedNumber
        Parameters:
        number - number to convert
        Returns:
        number in human readable form (e.g. one million one hundred)
        Throws:
        InputException - - when number is out of range
